import pytest



[docs]@pytest.fixture(autouse=True)
def sample_feast_dataframe_for_analysis(spark_session):
    data = [
        (1, "James", 32, 23, 34, True, "A"),
        (2, "Bond", 31, 22, 221, True, "A"),
        (3, "Daniel", 33, None, 2, False, "A"),
        (4, "Julia", 34, None, 21, True, "B"),
        (5, "Hanna", 35, 31, None, True, "B"),
        (6, "Peter", 36, 35, 18, False, None),
        (7, "Lauren", 35, 37, 34, True, "B"),
        (8, "Joe", 36, 33, 36, True, "B"),
        (9, "Redis", 34, 33, 36, True, "B"),
        (10, "Matata", 32, 0, 26, False, "B"),
        (11, "Hakuna", 31, 33, 36, True, "A"),
        (12, "Trump", 33, 33, 6, False, "A"),
        (13, "phenix", 35, None, 42, True, "C"),
        (14, "Chen", 36, 43, None, True, "C"),
        (15, "jackie", None, 34, 36, True, "C"),
    ]
    cols = ("u_id", "c_name", "i_maths", "i_english", "i_science", "b_passed", "c_div")
    df = spark_session.createDataFrame(data, cols)
    return df
